Supporter.name: Supporter
Supporter.description: +20 Hit and +4 Crit if an ally with the Support skill is within 3 hexes. (Doesn't stack.)

Resistor.name: Resistor
Resistor.description: +5 Magic Def to allies within 3 hexes.

Canto.name: Canto
Canto.description: After attacking, can use remaining movement to move again, but not if damaged in battle. Limited to Wait command after moving.

Hurry.name: Hurry
Hurry.description: Move an additional space, but limited to Wait command after moving.

Lethargy.name: Lethargy
Lethargy.description: Mov -1. (Invisible. Movement is listed as normal.)

Slow Start.name: Slow Start
Slow Start.description: Mov -1. Lost at Level 15. (Invisible. Movement is listed as reduced.)

Swimmer.name: Swimmer
Swimmer.description: Can move across Shoal, River, and Water terrain with movement cost 1.

Climber.name: Climber
Climber.description: Avo is not reduced to 0 while on Cliff terrain.

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: Avo bonus from terrain is multiplied by 1.5.

Huntsman.name: Huntsman
Huntsman.description: Ignores enemy Avo bonus from forest terrain while using a bow or crossbow.

Search.name: Search
Search.description:
In specific locations, find items.
If an enemy is guarding the item, fight them for 5 rounds. If the battle is lost, no Exp or item is gained. (Grants 16 Exp for battles, 8 Exp otherwise.)

Locktouch.name: Locktouch
Locktouch.description: Open a door or chest. (Grants 8 Exp.)

Hide.name: Hide
Hide.description: When on certain terrain, disappear from enemy view. Canceled if an enemy is adjacent, or if an enemy with the skill Watchful is within 3 hexes.

Obfuscation.name: Obfuscation
Obfuscation.description: Hides all statistical information. Canceled if an enemy is adjacent, or if an enemy with the skill Watchful is within 3 hexes.

Watchful.name: Watchful
Watchful.description: Cancels the skills Hide and Obfuscation within 3 hexes.

Expert.name: Expert
Expert.description: Failure rate for using equipment is calculated as if Level were +7.

Limited.name: Limited
Limited.description: Can only use equipment that is Rank 3 or lower. Unit will automatically fail to use Rank 4 or higher equipment.

Prepared.name: Prepared
Prepared.description: When attacked, automatically changes equipped weapon to be able to counterattack.

Versatile.name: Versatile
Versatile.description: After using a non-attacking spell, reverts to previous equipment.

Robbery.name: Robbery
Robbery.description: When defeating an enemy at range 0-1, randomly steals an item. Cannot steal rare items, limited items or items with Rank higher than Level. Can only activate up to 3 times per map.

Despoil.name: Despoil
Despoil.description: When defeating an enemy at range 0-1, get a small amount of gold depending on enemy level.

Armsthrift.name: Armsthrift
Armsthrift.description: Randomly prevents weapon durability from decreasing when used.

Mug.name: Mug
Mug.description: When hitting an enemy at range 0, randomly steals an unequipped item. Cannot steal rare items.

Mug+.name: Mug+
Mug+.description: When hitting an enemy at range 0, randomly steals any item. Cannot steal rare items. Against enemies with Robust and after activating at least 2 times in one map, effect becomes that of ordinary Mug.

Steal.name: Steal
Steal.description: Steal an unequipped weapon or item from an adjacent enemy. (Grants 8 Exp.) Cannot steal rare items or limited items. Only usable in place of moving. Can only be used up to 3 times per map.

Pursuit.name: Pursuit
Pursuit.description: When this unit's AS exceeds enemy's AS by 5 or more, +1 number of strikes.

Adept.name: Adept
Adept.description: When AS is 5 or more, may randomly add an additional attack.

Double-Shot.name: Double-Shot
Double-Shot.description: Attack with a bow with -5 Hit and x2 number of strikes. Cooldown of 4 turns.

Triple-Shot.name: Triple-Shot
Triple-Shot.description: Attack with a bow with x3 number of strikes; Hit -5 for the first attack, normal Hit for the second attack, Hit +5 for the third attack. Cooldown of 5 turns.

Astra.name: Astra
Astra.description: Attack with a sword with x5 number of strikes. Cooldown of 7 turns.

Deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
Deathmatch.description: Attack an enemy with 5 times the normal rounds of combat. Enemy must be able to counterattack. Both fighters can counterattack even if they take damage.

Aim.name: Aim
Aim.description: Attack with a bow, crossbow, or ballista with Hit +33. Only usable in place of moving.

Sunder.name: Sunder
Sunder.description: Attack with Crit +25. Only usable in place of moving.

Desperation.name: Desperation
Desperation.description: Attack an enemy with Hit +22. Enemy must be able to counterattack. Increases enemy Hit to 100 and reduces own Def (except shields) to 0. Both fighters can counterattack even if they take damage.

Focus Chant.name: Focus Chant
Focus Chant.description: Attack with magic with Hit +30 and Mt +10-30%. Cooldown of 7 turns.

Deadeye.name: Deadeye
Deadeye.description: Attack with a bow with range +1 and Hit -15. Only usable in place of moving.

Windsweep.name: Windsweep
Windsweep.description: Attack while preventing the enemy from counterattacking. Only usable in place of moving.

Pulverize.name: Pulverize
Pulverize.description: Attack with Def reduced to 0 and Atk doubled on first strike. Only usable in place of moving.

Mercy.name: Mercy
Mercy.description: Attack an enemy who has more than 1 HP remaining. If the enemy would be killed, their HP is instead reduced to 1.

Throw.name: Throw
Throw.description: Attacks with a range 1 weapon with Hit +10. Switches back to previously equipped weapon after combat.

One-Two.name: One-Two
One-Two.description: Functions as Attack command, available immediately after attacking. Cooldown of 6 turns.

Vantage.name: Vantage
Vantage.description: When attacked at range 0 while both being able to counterattack and having a higher AS than the enemy, attacks first instead.

Iaido.name: Iaido
Iaido.description: After avoiding an attack while a sword is equipped and able to counterattack, may boost Hit +33 and Crit +3 on counterattack.

Vengeful.name: Vengeful
Vengeful.description: When attacked and damaged while an axe is equipped and able to counterattack, may counterattack with Hit x2 and enemy damage added to Mt.

Counter.name: Counter
Counter.description: When attacked and able to counterattack, counterattack even if damaged by the attack.

Shieldfaire.name: Shieldfaire
Shieldfaire.description: Increases Shield Rate +18. (If shield rate would've been insufficient without the skill, displays a message in battle.)

Swordbane.name: Swordbane
Swordbane.description: When an enemy would hit with a sword, blade, or mace, randomly avoids attack.

Spearbane.name: Spearbane
Spearbane.description: When an enemy would hit with a spear, lance, or fork, randomly avoids attack.

Axebane.name: Axebane
Axebane.description: When an enemy would hit with an axe, randomly avoids attack.

Arrowbane.name: Arrowbane
Arrowbane.description: When an enemy would hit with a bow, crossbow, or ballista, randomly avoids attack.

Magicbane.name: Magicbane
Magicbane.description: When an enemy would hit with any magic, randomly avoids attack. Immune to Sleep and Berserk spells.

Miracle.name: Miracle
Miracle.description: When an enemy would hit for fatal damage, randomly avoids attack.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: When equipping a physical weapon and would be hit by a physical weapon, randomly avoids damage at the cost of weapon durability.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: Increases Avo +50 until next action is taken. Only usable before moving. Cooldown of 5 turns.

Flourish.name: Flourish
Flourish.description: Halves attack power but increases injury rate +33. Every 4 turns only.

Maim.name: Maim
Maim.description: When attacking an enemy, randomly doubles cripple rate. Can only activate up to 5 times per map.

Knock Away.name: Knock Away
Knock Away.description: When hitting an enemy, randomly unequips their shield.

Provoke.name: Provoke
Provoke.description: Enemy within 5 hexes gains Fury status against user, and will attempt to attack them if possible. Only usable before moving.

Battle Cry.name: Battle Cry
Battle Cry.description: Gains Mt +3 and Hit +10 for next battle. Effect is cumulative up to six times. Only usable before moving.

Overwatch.name: Overwatch
Overwatch.description: Gains Overwatch status. Until next turn, automatically attacks one enemy entering range of equipped weapon; if they take damage, their turn ends. Only usable before moving and while equipped with a bow, crossbow, or ballista. Status goes away if damage is taken.

Axe Guard.name: Axe Guard
Axe Guard.description: Gains Axe Def status. Until next action, randomly blocks attacks using equipped axe as a shield, with Def bonus equal to axe's Mt. Costs weapon durability for each block. Cannot counterattack while in effect. Only usable before moving and while equipping an axe.

Robust.name: Robust
Robust.description: Immune to Injured and Crippled statuses.

Robust+.name: Robust+
Robust+.description: Immune to Injured and Crippled statuses. Not displayed. Also set on force-deployed units.

Vulnerable.name: Vulnerable
Vulnerable.description: Increases rate of receiving Crippled status. Not displayed.

Hateful.name: Hateful
Hateful.description: When attacked, gains Fury status against attacker, and will attempt to attack them if possible. Not displayed.

Horse-Lover.name: Horse-Lover
Horse-Lover.description: When advancing to the next chapter, restores 20 HP to horse in possession.

Swap Horse.name: Swap Horse
Swap Horse.description: Switches horses with an adjacent ally. Requires both characters to be able to ride horses, but does not require both characters to possess a horse.

Blessing.name: Blessing
Blessing.description: At the start of each turn, heals 0-3 HP to all allies within 3 hexes.

Imbue.name: Imbue
Imbue.description: Recovers (Mag+3) HP. Only usable before moving and every 4 turns.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.description: Prevents use of all dark magic unil the next action of the unit or until the next turn. Only usable before moving and every 10 turns.

Paragon.name: Paragon
Paragon.description: Gains Exp x1.2 while Level is 10 or less.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: Protects an adjacent ally, entering combat in place of them if they are attacked and preventing them from being captured until either character uses a command other than Wait. Def and Avo are halved while in effect; shields are unaffected.

Convert.name: Convert
Convert.description: Class changes to Raze Monk or back to starting class. Cannot gain Exp or weapon skill while a Raze Monk.
